description: Discover how SAP SE is leveraging open source blockchain to innovate and enhance enterprise solutions. Learn about key initiatives like SAP Leonardo, partnerships with Hyperledger, and the transformative potential of blockchain technology in industries like finance and healthcare.
keywords: SAP, open source blockchain, Hyperledger, SAP Leonardo, SAP Cloud Platform, blockchain-as-a-service, enterprise solutions, interoperability, innovation, cost efficiency, security, smart contracts
title: SAP and Open Source Blockchain: A Corporate Strategy for Innovation
